title: 2 Exceptional Destinations To Host Your Next Corporate Group - JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel MacauTravelandtourworld.com
text:
2 Exceptional Destinations To Host Your Next Corporate Group â€“ JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel Macau Published on : Thursday, September 10, 2015
Designed for meeting organisers looking to take their corporate groupoff-site for a unique experience, JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel Macau are partnering together to offer an attract ive corporate accommodat ion deal that will surelydelight all delegates.
For bookings from now to June 2016 and with a minimum of 10 guestrooms, the package includes a welcome drink; breakfast for up to 2 persons per room; 1 complimentary room forevery 35 paying guestrooms per night (up to amaximum of 3 rooms); up to a maximum of 3 upgrades to the next available room category and a special **8% rebate off the final master bill for guestrooms only. To enjoy this fabulous deal, the offer must be booked at both JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel Macau.JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong is located in the prest igious Pacific Place complex in the heart of downtown, with many spectacular attract ions in close proximity as well as direct access to PacificPlace Shopping Mall, offering 150 retail shops, restaurants and a Cineplex, and only a two minute walk to the nearest MTR (Mass Transit Railway) and one ride away to famous Tsim Sha Tsui shopping belt.
Comprising 602 well-appointed guestrooms with complimentary in-room internetconnect ivity, the hotel offers an ideal venue for large incent ive and conference groups for accommodat ions. In addit ion to over 12,000 square feet of meet ing space, including the largest hotel ballroom on Hong Kong Island; providing suitable opt ions for a variety of business events for up to 1,100 guests, complemented by innovat ive culinary creat ions to delight even the most discerning palates.
Source:- JW Marriott Hotel
